text: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

text: Computer science education cannot make anybody an expert programmer any more than studying brushes and pigment can make somebody an expert painter.
author: Eric Raymond

text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

text: I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.
author: Albert Einstein

text: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
